featured.text: Upon closer examination, de Mestral observed that the burrs, which appeared straight to the naked eye, actually contained many small hooks that clung firmly to the loops in the fabric of his pants.

definition.zh_def: 緊緊抓住或附著於某物。
definition.en_def: Past tense of cling; to hold on tightly to something.
definition.example: The child clung to her mother's leg in fear.
